alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, south central St. Johns and central Putnam Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Interlachen, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Hastings, East Palatka, Orange Mills, Hollister, San Mateo, Satsuma and Mannville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
